title: Google ignoring emails on stolen pixel replacement!!!!
content:
After supplying all information that GOOGLE!!!!!!! did 100% send out a replacement handset which was previously blacklisted as lost/Stolen by a network over a year ago! GOOGLE are totally ignoring my emails and are not willing to do anything! as they don't believe they have? do they think that I've blacklisted it? check the dates!!!!!! check the IMEI from whom you got it from in the first place! 

This GOOGLE forum is a total waste of time!  I'd seriously think twice in purchasing any GOOGLE products 

Is anybody from GOOGLE inc actually reading this???????????? 

Love to get a reply.
